column5: Well it was a fine morning on the lake till the Wind came up again..lake was beauty this morning till 10:30 am  then she got rough had to pull lines early my crew was feeling a little sea sick ...but all in all they had a blast fighting Walleye all morning .. Small Dipsys on the boards 250 and 275 back 0 setting  one side was hot also 250 on a 2 setting with the ring was good ...Blue Berry Copper was the ticket ..Big Dipsys 105 on a 2 setting and 156 on a 3 setting ...go gett'm boys there are tons off Walleye 74 fow straight off Port Maitland .. ;D
WOW! Nice size walleye's. Thanks for sharing.
Thanks Steve, one question; when you say the "Small Dipsys on the board 250 and 275 back" can I assume that is back from the planer board?  thanks Dan
Those are some nice looking eyes wtg  Rob

Great erie walleye report steve !!!!!.  ..well done bud,sure looks like things are picking up down your way,i was waiting for one of your walleye reports !!!,nice fish too,they look very healthy too!!!.  ..happy customers as usual i see !!...cheers bud...
Man....look at the size of those eyes  Great job Fishmaster   Great pics and thanks for sharing! Leechman
Yes i run my small dipsys back 250 275 then attach to the board ...long leads catch more fish for me ..
